about.title: About me
intro: I'm Nguyen Phi Quoc Bao, someone passionate about programming and design, especially creating unique software / features and applying AI technology to my projects.
In my free time, I often look for something new to learn/explore to create what I like through programming, while improving my knowledge.
I also like watching anime, listening to music, and playing light games. Do you want to join with me? (´• ω •)ﾉ

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: One of the highlight projects developed and posted on github

chinokafuu.title: Chino Kafuu Discord Bot
chinokafuu.description: A cute employee at CafeDeNup discord server developed by using C# and Python

website-ban-linh-kien.title: Parts Sales Website
website-ban-linh-kien.description: A parts sales website developed with C# along with modern frameworks with a lots of features

cs-anilist.title: CS-AniList API
cs-anilist.description: A C# wrapper for the AniList API, helping you get anime and manga information from Anilist for use in .NET applications.

cs-owm.title: CS-OWM
cs-owm.description: A C# wrapper for the OpenWeatherMap API, providing easy access to real-time weather data in .NET applications.

csteam-works.title: CSteam-Works
csteam-works.description: A C# wrapper for the Steam API, allowing you to fetch simple steam data for use in .NET applications.

profile-page.title: Profile Page
profile-page.description: My personal website upgraded and developed by using Next.js and Tailwind CSS

journey.title: Education & Work
journey.description: Details about my educational background and work experience

work.title: Digital Transformation Intern
work.subtitle: Schneider Electric Manufacturing Vietnam
work.description: I am fortunate to have an internship at Schneider Electric as the main Full-stack Developer for the Global Supply Chain internal tool using ASP.NET MVC. Responsible for database design, SSO implementation for secure authentication, setup automatic email sending for users, building the Project Tracker system, and optimizing the system to ensure stability for domestic and regional users.

university.title: Software Engineering
university.subtitle: HCMC University of Foreign Languages and Information Technology
university.description: I am currently majoring in Software Engineering with a focus on Application Development and Software Engineering as well as team management skills. My current GPA is at 3.7 / 4.0

highschool.title: High School Diploma

highschool.description: A school honored to be named after the beloved Uncle Ho – the great leader of the Vietnamese nation. I am proud to have studied and graduated from this school
